Summary: I witnessed 2 orbs , got 3 pics of 1 of them.
divs: Sighting DetailsThis is my 4th sighting in the same area in the last 3 yrs. I was coming home from a hunting trip eastbound on 290 at 36 (brenham tx) I was looking for them. I had seen hovering pulsating orbs in pairs n 3s several times coming and goin to my ranch, comin from houston so ive been keeping an eye out. I saw 2 orbs, 1 close n bright, just south of the walmart, the other was lower, n further away, the 2nd was lower than the cl I se 1. I pulled into the lft turn lane and got my phone . I was too slow, by the time I got my camera up, the 1st orb pulsated n went superbright, then out. Where the orb was, now howvered a black triangle w a light on each point. It moved effortlessly east to west, dirwxtly over me n gone. I was able to catch 3 images of the 2nd stationary one. I got my pics n traffic behind me made me move on. This was the 4th or 5th time I have seen them. Oct 12 I saw 3 orbs , 1 flashed out n a triangle flew directly over my farmhouse, helicopter altitude but totally silent. I have seen them over the walmart in brenham 3 times b4.the 1st time I was in wonder, the 2nd 3rd n on I felt extereme curiosity and a drive to know what I was lookin at, no fear or negative feelings.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Brenham
There were no other sightings in Brenham on or around October 2nd 2013
